name: Letterhead (demo)
description:
A casual word game currently in development. Please let me know if you have any feedback or run into any bugs while playing!

Play as many words as you can before time runs out!

How to Play:

  • Click and drag to select letter tiles (adjacent or diagonal) to form words.
  • Words must be 3 letters or longer in length to be played.
  • Each letter tile can only be used once per word.
  • Once a letter is played, it'll disappear from the board, and any tiles above it will fall into its place. Try to plan your moves carefully!
  • Longer words are worth much more than shorter ones. You can use the falling letters to set up a huge word to play on a future turn!
